#!/usr/bin/env ruby
require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/textmate" require "erb" include ERB::Util
$items = [ { :label => "TODO", :matches => [ ], :regexp => /TODO[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/i }, { :label => "FIXME", :matches => [ ], :regexp => /FIX ?ME[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/i }, { :label => "CHANGED", :matches => [ ], :regexp => /CHANGED[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/ }, ]
TextMate.each_text_file do |filepath|
File.open(filepath) do |f| f.each_line do |line| $items.each do |item|
if(m = item[:regexp].match(line)) then item[:matches].push({ :file => filepath, :line => f.lineno, :content => line, :match => m[1], }) end
end end end
end
puts ERB.new(File.open("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/template.rhtml"), 0, '<>').result
